ygData.subject: Salil's Writ
ygData.msgSnippet: I found some item that I have no clue about.  It is called something like Salil s Writ. I can t read it, even though it appears to be a whole peice of paper.
ygData.messageBody:
I found some item that I have no clue about. It is called something like
Salil's Writ. I can't read it, even though it appears to be a whole peice of
paper. I got it off a creature that looked like an eye of zomm that
appeared on Kerra Isle. I have never seen another.
------
When the people we love are stolen from us, the way to have them live on is
to never stop loving them. Buildings burn, people die, but real love is
forever. -- The Crow
